name: pixel heist (IHONG)
description:
Round-based game, 2 teams (cops vs robbers) try to execute/prevent the perfect bank heist. Includes an offline tutorial and an online mode (steam) to play with friends. Supports Mouse/Keyboard and Controllers.

Features:

  • easy steam server hosting and joining via server browser (can choose to protect server with password)
  • smuggle a bomb to the main vault and blow it up
  • steal money or jewelry
  • use the main entrance, the back door or climb up the roof and destroy some windows to gain access
  • disguise yourself as a civilian and hide between NPCs
  • assassinate bank employee NPCs and use their clothing as disguise
  • set plants on fire, trigger the fire alarm and open fire doors
  • shoot the bank cops or the robbers
  • use cameras from a monitor, hack them as robbers or repair them as cops
  • choose between 6 classes, each with their own abilities and strengths to fit your playstyle
  • choose between 5 different weapons

Controls:

WASD, Spacebar, Shift - Normal movement with jumping and sprinting

F - Interact with objects

E - Use your characters abilities

G - Drop objects

Escape - Open Ingame Menu (Change Graphics Quality, Leave Server, Quit Game)

Enter - Open Chat

Tab - Show scoreboard

P - Restart the round if something went wrong or another friend joined

The goals for robbers:

  • smuggle the bomb to the safe, blow it up, steal cash and jewelery, get your filled bags back to the escape helicopter and enter it
  • alternatively, kill all the cops (they have limited respawns) or hope that a cop shoots a civilian NPC

The goals for cops:

  • identify the robbers (they look like normal civilan NPCs and can change their clothing to look like employees) and kill them

After a round finished the game starts another round by itself, if something goes wrong you can always press "P" to restart the round. Have fun!
